filesystem.description: Read/write/search files anywhere on your computer

memory.description: Persistent knowledge graph - Beast remembers things forever

time.description: Time and timezone queries (1-2 tools, trivial for any LLM)

fetch.description: HTTP fetching via MCP (works on LAN too). Beast has a built-in fetch_url tool as well.

git.description: Git operations: commit, diff, log, branch, status
git.note: Beast can also use shell tool for git commands. Enable this for richer git integration.

sqlite.description: Local SQLite database queries and management

sequential-thinking.description: Complex reasoning - breaks down hard problems step by step
sequential-thinking.note: Only useful in FULL tier (Claude/OpenAI). LITE tier uses AGENTS.md reasoning prompts instead.

playwright.description: Full browser automation - navigate, click, type, screenshot web pages

brave-search.description: Web search capabilities using Brave Search API

github.description: GitHub operations: issues, PRs, repos, code search
github.note: Needs GITHUB_TOKEN env var. Generate at https://github.com/settings/tokens

slack.description: Slack messaging: read/send messages, list channels
slack.note: Needs SLACK_TOKEN env var (xoxb-... bot token)
